original_text: But the seventh day is a Sabbath day. It is special for the Lord your God. You must not do any work on that day. Your son and your daughter must not work on that day. Your servants, male or female, must not work on that day. The foreign person who lives among you and even your animals must not work on that day.
korean_text: 일곱째 날은 네 하나님 여호와의 안식일인즉 너나 네 아들이나 네 딸이나 네 남종이나 네 여종이나 네 가축이나 네 문안에 머무는 객이라도 아무 일도 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: But the seventh day is a Sabbath day.
It is special for the Lord your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그날은 당신의 하나님 여호와를 위해 특별한 날입니다.

sentences.original_text: You must not do any work on that day.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그날 어떤 일도 해서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: Your son and your daughter must not work on that day.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 아들과 딸도 그날 일해서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: Your servants, male or female, must not work on that day.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 남녀 종들도 그날 일해서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: The foreign person who lives among you
and even your animals must not work on that day.
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 당신의 동물들도 그날 일해서는 안 됩니다.
